item.title: Cyan Abstract - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

RevengePK:

Looks good. One suggestion, instead of assigning a font color for each div or tag, just put assign an overall font color to the body tag.

I don’t know why I didn’t think of that lol. Edited the posted codes and download link.

Read full topic

item.title: Cyan Abstract - One Page Template
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Another release. Hope you like it.

Do not remove the ‘Design by RSPSDesigns’ from the copyright footer.

Image:

Codes:
Index.html:

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

	<head>
		<title>Template - Home</title>
		<link href="css/main.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/navigation.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<link href="css/smoothDivScroll.css" type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" />
		<script src="js/jquery.min.1.8.1.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery-ui-1.8.2.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.mousewheel.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.kinetic.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script src="js/jquery.smoothdivscroll-1.3-min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			$(document).ready(function () {
				$(".imageSlider").smoothDivScroll({
					mousewheelScrolling: "allDirections",
					manualContinuousScrolling: true,
					autoScrollingMode: "onStart"
				});
			});
		</script>
	</head>

	<body>
		<nav>
			<ul>
				<li><a href="index.html" class="active">Home</a></li>
				<li><a href="forum/">Forum</a></li>
				<li><a href="game.html">Play Now</a></li>
				<li><a href="highscores/">Highscores</a></li>
				<li><a href="downloads.html">Downloads</a></li>
				<li><a href="membership.html">Membership</a></li>
				<li><a href="media.html">Media</a></li>
			</ul>
		</nav>
		<div class="space"></div>
		<a href="index.html">
			<div class="imageBanner"></div>
		</a>
		<div class="wrapper">
			<div class="imageSlider">
				<img src="img/slideshow/slide1.png" alt="" />
				<img src="img/slideshow/slide2.png" alt="" />
				<img src="img/slideshow/slide3.png" alt="" />
				<img src="img/slideshow/slide4.png" alt="" />
				<img src="img/slideshow/slide5.png" alt="" />
			</div>
			<div class="socialMediaBar">
				<marquee behavior="scroll" direction="left" scrollamount="2">Recent News...</marquee>
			</div>
			<div class="contentTitle">
				Main Content Title
			</div>
			<div class="content">
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
				<p>
					Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
				</p>
			</div>
		<div class="sidebarWrapper">
			<div class="sidebarTitle">
				Sidebar Title
			</div>
			<div class="sidebar">
				Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit...
			</div>
		</div>
		</div>
	</body>

	<footer>
		<div class="footerInner">
			Design by <a href="http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=502023" target="_blank">3lv3n snip3r</a> © 2013<br />
			Server is not affiliated with <a href="http://www.runescape.com/" target="_blank">RuneScape</a>...
		</div>
	</footer>

</html>

main.css

* {
	margin: 0;
	padding: 0;
	font-family: 'Candara', Arial, sans-serif;
	color: #fff;
}

body {
	background: url('../img/bg.png') fixed;
}

p {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.space {
	padding: 25px;
}

.imageBanner {
	background: url('../img/logo.png') no-repeat;
	width: 1060px;
	height: 150px;
	margin: 0 auto auto auto;
}

.wrapper {
	height: auto;
	width: 1120px;
	margin: 15px auto auto auto;
}

.content {
	height: 100%;
	width: 800px;
	float: left;
	margin-left: 10px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	background: rgba(10,10,10,0.5);
	border-left: 1px solid #000;
	border-right: 1px solid #000;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
	padding: 20px;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
}

.contentTitle {
	font-size: 150%;
	text-align: center;
	background: rgba(0,255,255,0.65);
	width: 840px;
	float: left;
	margin-left: 10px;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
}

.socialMediaBar {
	color: #fff;
	padding: 15px 10px;
	width: 1072px;
	margin-left: 10px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
	background: rgba(10,10,10,0.5);
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
}

.socialMediaBar a {
	text-decoration: underline;
}

.socialMediaBar a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

.sidebarWrapper {
	float: left;
	margin-left: 10px;
	width: 240px;
	height: auto;
	margin-top: -31px;
}

.sidebar {
	height: 100%;
	width: 200px;
	background: rgba(10,10,10,0.5);
	padding: 20px;
	margin-right: 10px;
	border-left: 1px solid #000;
	border-right: 1px solid #000;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
}

.sidebarTitle {
	font-size: 150%;
	text-align: center;
	background: rgba(0,255,255,0.65);
	width: 240px;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
}

footer {
	clear: both;
	background: rgba(10,10,10,0.5);
	width: 1078px;
	margin: 0px auto;
	padding: 10px;
	text-align: left;
	border: 1px solid #000;
	box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	-ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 15px rgba(0,0,0,1), 0 0 20px #000;
	font-size: 100%;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

.footerInner {
	margin: 0px auto;
	text-align: center;
	font-size: 100%;
}

.footerInner a {
	text-decoration: underline;
}

.footerInner a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}

Download: Click here

Hope you like it.
